info.name: Stylish ― Hides my deleted styles!
info.description: Important: Click the "Show Css Code" button first. The install button will work after that. I highly recommend this style that makes the "Show Css Code" button much easier to find. ― This simple code has been created to hide all the author's deleted styles and align a few contents in the middle of their cell table to appeal the eyes. [ Version: 1.0.0b | View change logs (None) ]
